lines.text: [Mickey is completely strapped into a chair]
Talk about your ironclad contract.
Julius, Julius, baby, Daddy's found you a brand new brain.
Wait! You're not r-r-really gonna...
Put your brain in his body?
[Buzz!]
That's right!
[Mickey is playing a video game when Minnie enters]
Mickey? Hello?
[Stands in front of TV]
I'm so excited about tonight. Aren't you?
Minnie! You trying to get me killed?
Hmm, maybe. Oh, Mickey Mouse! You forgot, didn't you?
Oh, no. No, no. Forgot what?
Our anniversary?
Oh, yeah! Ha-ha! Anniversary. Of what?
Our very first date. Ooh! Well, from now on you can date your stupid video game!
Dr. Frankenollie at your service. You're here for the job, hmm?
Yeah. I mean, no! No.
Oh, don't be shy. It's not just a job. It's an adventure.
I hate adventures.
Perfect! You're hired.

[He and Julius have switched brains]
Uh, you monster, me Mickey. Mickey Mouse. You know, Mickey Mouse? Just look in my wallet. You'll see.
[Julius takes out Mickey's wallet; the first picture is from Steamboat Willie]
Ah, that's old. Ha. There's me, next to my girlfriend, Minnie.
Oh, Minnie.
Yeah. And she likes my body and my mind. In the same place, that is.
Let me introduce your co-worker. I made him myself.
Oh, I don't feel like myself. I...
[Pull back; Mickey is now Julius]
Oh, my gosh! I'm not myself. That crazy gizmo really worked.
